    • getCredentials

      public User getCredentials()
      This function fetches credentials. Credentials are set upon installation of the system The table used for the credentials is called "User"
      Returns:
      userCred Type User

      public String[] handleLogin(User user)
      Logs in to maxx system
      Returns:
      credentials String[] which returns ([0] - userId:String, [1] - access_token, [2] - fullname:String )).
